about_the_game:
Pickup Trash Simulator Remastered

Pickup Trash Simulator Remastered Is A Game About Picking Up Trash In A Park Which Leads To Super Exhilarating Gameplay.
You Get To Put Trash Into Two Dumpsters In The Middle Of The Park, You Just Pick It Up And Throw It Into The Dumpster.
The Trash Has A Variety Of Cups Like Cup 1 And Cup 1, You Get To Pickup The Same Ol' Cup About 300 Times.

It's A Blast To Just Play And Enjoy The Game, Plus A Bonus When You Get Every Cup In The Dumpster You Just Restart The Level And Do It Over Again. Because Who Needs Endings.

There's Plenty Of Stuff To Do Even If The Game Doesn't Have An Ending, I Added Some Extra Stuff To Keep You Entertained Even If There Isn't Much To The Base Game, Or If Your Feeling A Little Different You Can Go Through The Variety Of Extras Like Night Time, Snow Mode, Rain Mode And Sandbox Mode.

You Could Play Forever Literally!

Even If You Don't Like Picking Up Trash In Real Life There's A Video Game For That,

Have Fun.
detailed_description:
Pickup Trash Simulator Remastered

Pickup Trash Simulator Remastered Is A Game About Picking Up Trash In A Park Which Leads To Super Exhilarating Gameplay.
You Get To Put Trash Into Two Dumpsters In The Middle Of The Park, You Just Pick It Up And Throw It Into The Dumpster.
The Trash Has A Variety Of Cups Like Cup 1 And Cup 1, You Get To Pickup The Same Ol' Cup About 300 Times.

It's A Blast To Just Play And Enjoy The Game, Plus A Bonus When You Get Every Cup In The Dumpster You Just Restart The Level And Do It Over Again. Because Who Needs Endings.

There's Plenty Of Stuff To Do Even If The Game Doesn't Have An Ending, I Added Some Extra Stuff To Keep You Entertained Even If There Isn't Much To The Base Game, Or If Your Feeling A Little Different You Can Go Through The Variety Of Extras Like Night Time, Snow Mode, Rain Mode And Sandbox Mode.

You Could Play Forever Literally!

Even If You Don't Like Picking Up Trash In Real Life There's A Video Game For That,

Have Fun.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Mint 20
  • Processor: i5 Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 5.1
  • VR Support: Not Supported
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Mint 21.3
  • Processor: i7 Processor
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 7.1
  • VR Support: Not Supported

name: Pickup Trash Simulator Remastered

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Base Game Will Run Fine 60 Fps Average But Could Drop To As Low As 30 Depending On What You Spawn In Sandbox.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: i5 Processor
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Pickup Trash Simulator Remastered Is A Game About Picking Up Trash In A Park Because You Love The Environment. Picking Up Trash Is Fun For All Ages Kids And Adults Alike So Pickup Some Trash And Have Fun.
